channel.title: Points
channel.description: Where would I add magepoints += 5 to make it so you get 5 points when you kill someone? And -= 1 points so you lose 1 when you get killed by someone?

item.title: Points
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

[quote=“Dario14, post:5, topic:457630”]PlayerAssistant.java in the applyDead() method on top of the kill message for example, “You have defeated(etc.)” something like
c.magepoints += 5; and then look for the death message for example, “Oh dear you have died!” add something along the lines of c.magepoints -= 1; if you only want this to happen in the wilderness make sure the death is under duelstatus 6 and the gaining points inWild[/quote]

I would have known that if I had a " You have defeated " message, but I don’t… That’s why I’m lost. Lol

Read full topic

item.title: Points
item.dc:creator: @Dario14 Dario14
item.description:
@Dario14 wrote:

PlayerAssistant.java in the applyDead() method on top of the kill message for example, “You have defeated(etc.)” something like
c.magepoints += 5; and then look for the death message for example, “Oh dear you have died!” add something along the lines of c.magepoints -= 1; if you only want this to happen in the wilderness make sure the death is under duelstatus 6 and the gaining points inWild

item.title: Points

item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

For points when killing someone, you can try looking at the code for a PVP point system, seeing as you get a PVP point when you kill someone, i’m sure it can easily be converted over to this.
